metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2684 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Shibboleth Service Provider (SP) before 2.5.4 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted SAML message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-shib2 - 2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1
libshibsp-plugins - 2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1
libshibsp6 - 2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1
shibboleth-sp2-common - 2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1
shibboleth-sp2-schemas - 2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1
shibboleth-sp2-utils - 2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.3+dfsg-2.1build1').
